scenes.description: Koseki Bijou and Todoroki Hajime perform 'Cirno's Perfect Math Class'.
MC section where Hajime praises Bijou and gives her a coin before leaving.
Bijou talks to herself on stage, counting the remaining challenges.
Amane Kanata and La+ Darknesss join the stage and challenge Bijou to a battle.
Koseki Bijou, Amane Kanata, and La+ Darknesss perform 'Make It Out Alive'.

subtitles.original: うっざー！
subtitles.english: So annoying!

subtitles.original: 因幡ウサギ 可愛げもないのに 新参の ゾウどもは ホイホイホイ
subtitles.english: Inaba bunny, not even cute, but the new elephants go 'hoi hoi hoi'

subtitles.original: 再生百万回 もれなく 愚民なんて どういうことなのよ
subtitles.english: A million views, and everyone's a fool? What's that about?

subtitles.original: どちらかって言うなら サーバー管理も お疲れさんってとこにゃ
subtitles.english: If anything, I should say "thanks for the hard work" to the server management.

subtitles.original: わかった！ アタイがあまりにも天才だから嫉妬してるんでしょ！
subtitles.english: I get it! You're just jealous because I'm such a genius!

subtitles.original: ほんと、しょうがないわね！ せっかくだからアタイの天才の秘訣をちょっとだけ教えてあげてもいいわよ！
subtitles.english: Honestly, you're hopeless! Since you're here, I'll let you in on just a bit of my genius secret!

subtitles.original: あたいのあたいのあたいのあたいのあたいのあたいの あたいのあたいの H2O
subtitles.english: My, my, my, my, my, my, my, my, H2O

subtitles.original: 集めて集めて集めて集めて束ねても
subtitles.english: Collect, collect, collect, collect, and bundle them up

subtitles.original: あたいのあたいのあたいのあたいのあたいのあたいの あたいのあたいの丈夫な頭に
subtitles.english: My, my, my, my, my, my, my, my, inside my sturdy head

subtitles.original: 集まれ集まれ集まれ集まれ変わらない
subtitles.english: Gather, gather, gather, gather, it never changes

subtitles.original: あためてあためてあためてあためてあためてあためて あためて食べたら
subtitles.english: Warm them, warm them, warm them, warm them, warm them, warm them, and if I eat them warm

subtitles.original: あの子のあの子のあの子のあの子の手をひねる
subtitles.english: I'll twist that kid's, that kid's, that kid's, that kid's arm

subtitles.original: あたいのあたいのあたいのあたいのあたいのあたいの 完璧 いわゆるいわゆるいわゆるいわゆる パーフェクト！
subtitles.english: My, my, my, my, my, my, perfection, in other words, in other words, in other words, in other words, perfect!

subtitles.original: ひゃくおくちょうまんバッチリよ！
subtitles.english: One hundred billion trillion, perfectly!

subtitles.original: 山落ち意味など無いわ キャラクター立てばいいのよ
subtitles.english: Climax, resolution, it's all meaningless, as long as the character stands out!

subtitles.original: 元気があればなんでも 1、2、9！
subtitles.english: With energy, you can do anything: 1, 2, 9!

subtitles.original: くるくる時計の針 くるくる頭まわる
subtitles.english: Round and round go the clock hands, round and round my head spins,

subtitles.original: だって つぶら目玉 2つしかないのに 三本の針なんて ちんぷんかんぷん
subtitles.english: Because I've only got two round eyeballs, but three hands on a clock? It's all Greek to me.

subtitles.original: 次々問題出る まだまだ授業続く
subtitles.english: Problems come out one after another, the lesson keeps going on and on.

subtitles.original: 凍る部屋の中 ひやりとした温度も 時間も気にせずゆっくりしていってね
subtitles.english: Inside the frozen room, don't mind the chilly temperature or the time, just take it easy!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ！ バーカバーカ！ バーカバーカ！ バーカバーカ！
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ！ バーカバーカ！ バーカバーカ！ バーカバーカ！
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ！ バーカバーカ！ バーカバーカ！ バーカバーカ！
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: もうバカでいいわよ、知らないっ！
subtitles.english: Fine, I'm an idiot then, I don't care!

subtitles.original: バーカバーカ！ バーカバーカ！
subtitles.english: Idiot, idiot! Idiot, idiot!

subtitles.original: ふーっ、速めのダンスについてこれるなんて、なかなかやるな！
subtitles.english: Phew! Being able to keep up with that fast dance, you're pretty good!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: I did it!

subtitles.original: よし、コインをやるぞ。ほい！
subtitles.english: Alright, here's a coin. Take it!

subtitles.original: やったー！ イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Woo-hoo!

subtitles.original: I got a coin!
subtitles.english: I got a coin!

subtitles.original: はっ、はじめー！ Thank you for dancing with me!
subtitles.english: Ha-Hajime! Thank you for dancing with me!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was so much fun!

subtitles.original: 楽しかった、ありがとう！ Thank you!
subtitles.english: It was fun, thank you! Thank you!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、 I must go.
subtitles.english: Well then, I must go.

subtitles.original: うおー、オッケー！ バイバイー！
subtitles.english: Whoa, okay! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: Bye bye! Let's go!
subtitles.english: Bye bye! Let's go!

subtitles.original: ふー... Oh.
subtitles.english: Phew... Oh.

subtitles.original: Oh, we're already okay... Ah, I see.
subtitles.english: Oh, we're already okay... Ah, I see.

subtitles.original: Whoa! What's next then?
subtitles.english: Whoa! What's next then?

subtitles.original: The rest is... let me count...
subtitles.english: The rest is... let me count...

subtitles.original: One, two...
subtitles.english: One, two...

subtitles.original: Two challenges left, I think, for two coins!
subtitles.english: Two challenges left, I think, for two coins!

subtitles.original: ほっ、はっ、はっ、はっ！
subtitles.english: Ho, ha, ha, ha!

subtitles.original: 待っといたぞ、ビブー！
subtitles.english: I've been waiting for you, Biboo!

subtitles.original: ビブー！
subtitles.english: Biboo!

subtitles.original: Amane Kanata La+ Darknesss Joins the Battle!
subtitles.english: Amane Kanata La+ Darknesss Joins the Battle!

subtitles.original: えっ、かなた先輩？ ラプラス？
subtitles.english: Eh, Kanata-senpai? La+?

subtitles.original: What are you doing here?
subtitles.english: What are you doing here?

subtitles.original: これが欲しければ、我々と勝負だ！
subtitles.english: If you want this, you'll have to face us!

subtitles.original: うわっ、My coin!
subtitles.english: Whoa, my coin!

subtitles.original: 勝負だ！
subtitles.english: It's a showdown!

subtitles.original: 迫りくるゾンビを全部倒すことが、できるかな！？
subtitles.english: Can you defeat all the approaching zombies!?

subtitles.original: おー、うわー。じゃ、お手柔らかにー...
subtitles.english: Oh, whoa. Well, go easy on me...

subtitles.original: しない！
subtitles.english: Not!

subtitles.original: Make It Out Alive Lyrics, Music: Taka, Kane Churko, Jamil Kazmi
subtitles.english: Make It Out Alive Lyrics, Music: Taka, Kane Churko, Jamil Kazmi

subtitles.original: Far away, far away, far away you...
subtitles.english: Far away, far away, far away you...

subtitles.original: Tryna put the pressure on
subtitles.english: Tryna put the pressure on

subtitles.original: Nowhere to go, nowhere to go, nowhere to go
subtitles.english: Nowhere to go, nowhere to go, nowhere to go

subtitles.original: No road is left to run
subtitles.english: No road is left to run

subtitles.original: Our souls, our souls weigh tons
subtitles.english: Our souls, our souls weigh tons

subtitles.original: Demons close to shake me up
subtitles.english: Demons close to shake me up

subtitles.original: Bring it on, bring it on, bring it on
subtitles.english: Bring it on, bring it on, bring it on

subtitles.original: 'Cause we haven't had enough
subtitles.english: 'Cause we haven't had enough

subtitles.original: Don't give up the fight
subtitles.english: Don't give up the fight

subtitles.original: Make it out alive
subtitles.english: Make it out alive

subtitles.original: Set this heart on fire, woah, woah, woah
subtitles.english: Set this heart on fire, woah, woah, woah

subtitles.original: Don't give up it's gonna be alright
subtitles.english: Don't give up it's gonna be alright

subtitles.original: 'Cause I won't let you down, woah, woah, woah
subtitles.english: 'Cause I won't let you down, woah, woah, woah

subtitles.original: We're gonna make it out alive!
subtitles.english: We're gonna make it out alive!
